## Metagenômica Introdução


<div id="carousel" class="slideshow-container" style="max-width: 1000px; margin: auto; position: relative">
</div>

<div style="text-align:center; margin-top: 10px;">
  <a class="prev" onclick="plusSlides(-1)" style="font-size:30px;padding:8px;cursor:pointer;">❮</a>
  <a class="next" onclick="plusSlides(1)" style="font-size:30px;padding:8px;cursor:pointer;">❯</a>
</div>

<style>
  .mySlides {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 90vh; /* ocupa até 90% da altura da tela */
    object-fit: contain;
    display: none;
  }
</style>

<script>
  const totalSlides = 97;
  const container = document.getElementById("carousel");

  for (let i = 1; i <= totalSlides; i++) {
    const num = String(i).padStart(2, '0'); // gera 01, 02, ..., 97
    const img = document.createElement("img");
    img.src = `../presentations/Metagenomica-${num}.png`;
    img.classList.add("mySlides");
    container.appendChild(img);
  }

  let slideIndex = 1;
  showSlides(slideIndex);

  function plusSlides(n) {
    showSlides(slideIndex += n);
  }

  function showSlides(n) {
    const slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides");
    if (n > slides.length) slideIndex = 1;
    if (n < 1) slideIndex = slides.length;
    for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
      slides[i].style.display = "none";
    }
    slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block";
  }
</script>
